text: KLOK-FM (99.5 FM) is a radio station broadcasting a Regional Mexican format. Licensed to Greenfield, California, United States, the station serves the Santa Cruz area. The station is currently owned by Entravision Communications. ==History== The station went on the air as KSUR-FM on New Year's Day 1994. On July 15, 1994, the station changed its call sign to KKHI-FM; on September 30 that same year, the call changed back to KSUR-FM; then once more on January 17, 1995 to the current KLOK-FM. ==References== ==External links== * LOK-FM Category:Radio stations established in 1994 LOK-FM Category:Entravision Communications stations Category:1994 establishments in California
title: KLOK-FM
